cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.len

Class LengthModelLearn

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.len.LengthModelLearn

  • public class LengthModelLearn
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to learn the parameters of the length model from a parallel corpus (two files).
    Author:
    albarron
    See Also:
    cat.lump.sim.cl.len.LengthModel
